actors: rachel nichols,lexa doig,tony amendola,Magda Apanowicz,Erik Knudsen,Jennifer Spence
title: Continuum
description: A low rank policewoman from the future is the only one who manages to follow a group of terrorist into the present and has to learn about the consequences of timetravel.
warning: Final season feels very rushed, stop watching 15 minutes short of the last episode of season 3.
